Other:
- Fixed spectating ending 1 minute before the game ended
- Fixed Hero Demo starting you at max level
- Fixed the boon level display in the hero pages not working correctly
- Changed default shop music back to original
Abilities:
- Fixed {{Icon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist not being able to jump during {{Icon|Life Drain}} Life Drain
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives collision size reduced by 10%
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives projectile speed reduced by 10%
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives base damage reduced from 75 to 35
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.6
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives DPS spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
- {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives T3 reduced from +75 Damage and +5 Bleed to +40 Damage and +5 Bleed
- Fixed {{Icon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives bouncing to other units even if it did not impact the target
- Fixed Rage and {{Icon|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting not clearing out on death
- Fixed {{Icon|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting deferred damage waking him up from sleep
- Fixed {{Icon|Killing Blow}} Killing Blow falling through the world sometimes
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop cooldown increased from 70s to 80s
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop duration reduced from 20s to 17s
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop bomb no longer silences in the base (now part of t3)
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop bomb slow duration increased from 3s to 4.5s
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop T2 now also has +5m radius
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 no longer has +12m radius
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 no longer extends debuff duration by +2s
- {{Icon|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 silences enemies for 4.5s
